prompts: Create a dragon-like Pokemon with icy blue accents and a fierce expression.
I want a legendary Pokemon that embodies the essence of ice and darkness combined.
Generate a mythical creature with a sleek, armored body and powerful wings.
Make an imposing Pokemon design that features contrasting colors of black and light blue.
Imagine a majestic ice-type Pokemon soaring through snowy mountains with elegance.
Design a Pokemon that stands out with sharp features and a unique color palette.
Show me a Pokemon that represents the ultimate fusion of ice and dragon elements.
